result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles E Ramsey Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Charles E Ramsey Jr
Current: 321 E. 2nd Street South, Ladysmith, WI 54848 United States  (Effective: 08-03-2017)
Prior: 136 S. 2nd Street, Barron, WI 54812

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF83, 15CF311 and 15CF352 called.  State recites agreement.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented and discussed.

15CF83
Count 1 - Guilty plea entered
Count 4 - DRI

15CF311 - DRI

15CF352 - DRI

The Court finds plea is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given and finds the defendant guilty.  Court orders PSI.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 12, 2016 at 11:30 am.

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko.  Defendant Charles E Ramsey in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
  Plea of Not Guilty
 Plea hearing scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko by telephone.  Defendant Charles E Ramsey in custody.  Russell E Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF352, 15CF311 and 15CF83 called.  Attorney Yonko requests 2 day furlough for defendant - State objects - Court denies modification of bond and request for a furlough.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.  
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.  
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold.

8-13-2015   CASH BOND IS ADJUSTED DOWN FROM A $250.00 CASH BOND TO A $100.00 CASH BOND.   ALL OTHER CONDITONS TO REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko.  Defendant Charles E Ramsey in custody.   Rachel Payne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

3:32  Court relates and gives appearances.
3:33  Officer Anthony Weigand called, sworn, direct by State.  Witness identifies defendant.
3:35  Cross by Atty. Yonko.
3:37  State asks court to take judicial notice of certified copy of bail bond.  Court takes judicial notice.
3:38  Atty. Yonko makes argument.
3:39  Court finds probable cause.  Bound over.
Arraignment hearing set.

Defense moves for bond modification.
Court modifies bond to a $100 cash bond.  All other conditions of previous bond to remain in full force and effect.

  Arraignment scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko.  Defendant Charles E Ramsey in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense requests bond modification. State objects. Court denies the request.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.  
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.  
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold.

Defendant Charles E Ramsey in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko who appears by phone.  Defendant Charles E Ramsey in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
